subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Avila, Detroit’s catcher, sustained his fourth significant blow to the head of the season as the Tigers lost Game 3 of their American League division series against the Baltimore Orioles and were swept.
snippet: Avila, Detroit’s catcher, sustained his fourth significant blow to the head of the season as the Tigers lost Game 3 of their American League division series against the Baltimore Orioles and were swept.
